chapter.title: Plan and share your objectives
chapter.p: Once prioritized, objectives can be planned on the timeline. Simply expand the objective you want to plan and click “Plan on Timeline.” This will move your objective from the backlog to your plan, where you can begin defining your plan, adding required projects and related work. (N.B. Once planned, the objective will no longer appear in your backlog.)

Your planned objective will appear in the current month of your plan timeline and have the default duration of one month. Its value statement will also be preserved to help inform your planning. You can access it by clicking your objective’s name in the pop-over:
And if you’d like to adjust your objective's schedule, you can interactively move it around the timeline and modify either end of the objective bar.
